content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  February 17 (Fitch) Boston Scientific Corp.'s (NYSE: BSX) ratings are  unaffected by its recent settlement with Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ) regarding  litigation associated with BSX's acquisition of Guidant in 2006  according to  Fitch Ratings.
